bio: An NFT project committed to establishing a genuine business framework.
contributionDescription:
Apetimism was among the first NFT projects on Optimism and remains one of the few active today. We guide users to Layer-2, prepping them for mass adoption while educating extensively. 

We've also helped early NFT projects like Bored Town and Oppa Bear transition to Optimism. We've onboarded thousands, marking significant early adoption impact.

Beyond on-chain activities, we've organized numerous offline events, showcasing the dedication of those in the Optimism community, even during bear markets.
impactDescription:
Our efforts extend beyond the Optimism network, as we also assist in onboarding individuals to other blockchains on the OP stack, including Base and Zora, using our tools and products.

Although it's been over a year since our NFT project was minted, we remain active in educating people through a variety of activities, including exclusive content, bi-weekly AMAs, and multiple in-person events.

Being a team of entrepreneurs with expertise in NFTs, we provide guidance to those seeking advice on executing NFT projects on the OP Stack. To date, we've advised over 30 NFT projects bringing them to be a part of Optimism Collective.

impactMetrics.description: Amount of Users Onboarded by us
